go: Description: Move in a certain direction.
look: Description: Look at a tile, either the current one or an adjacent one.
drink: Description: Drink liquid from a source.
trade: Description: Trade with a settlement of some kind.
raid: Description: Attack a settlement of some kind.
i: Description: Lists your inventory, or if used with an object name checks if you have that object in your inventory
inventory: Description: Lists your inventory, or if used with an object name checks if you have that object in your inventory
take: There is no limit on what you can pick up, but moving requires your load to be within your limit
Description: Take an object lying in an area.
drop: Description: Drop something from your inventory.
craft: Description: Craft an object with resources from your inventory.
recipe: Description: Check the recipe for an item.
fill: Description: Fill a container with liquid.
config: Description: Display the config screen and options.
ht: Description: Check your current hunger and thirst.
sleep: Description: sleep until morning if night.
wait: Description: Wait for time to pass.
loot: Description: Loot a raided settlement of some kind.
smoke: Smoking requires both a smoker and a fuel source
Description: Smoke raw food or an item.
